root.name: Karaoke Revolution Presents American Idol Encore
root.description: Soundtrack"Black Hole Sun" by Soundgarden"Black Velvet" by Alannah Myles"Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen"Close My Eyes Forever" by Ozzy Osbourne Lita Ford"Come Sail Away" by Styx"Copacabana" by Barry Manilow"Glamorous" by Fergie Ludacris"Heart of Glass" by Blondie"Hemorrhage (In My Hands)" by Fuel"Holiday" by Madonna"How to Save a Life" by the Fray"(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction" by the Rolling Stones"I Don't Want to Miss a Thing" by Aerosmith"(I Just) Died In Your Arms" by Cutting Crew"In the Air Tonight" by Phil Collins"Irreplaceable" by Beyonce"It Ends Tonight" by the All-American Rejects"It's Still Rock and Roll To Me" by Billy Joel"Knocking on Heaven's Door" by Guns N' Roses"Lips of an Angel" by Hinder"Midnight Train to Georgia" by Gladys Knight and the Pips"My Cherie Amour" by Stevie Wonder"My Heart Will Go On" by Celine Dion"Put Your Records On" by Corinne Bailey Rae"Rio" by Duran Duran"September" by Earth, Wind Fire"Sister Christian" by Night Ranger"Sweet Dreams" by Eurythmics"Tainted Love" by Soft Cell"These Words" by Natasha Bedingfield"Time of the Season" by the Zombies"Tiny Dancer" by Elton John"Too Little Too Late" by JoJo"Unfaithful" by Rihanna"Walking on Sunshine" by Katrina the Waves"You Can't Hurry Love" by Diana Ross the Supremes"You're Beautiful" by James Blunt"More than a Feeling" by Boston (Secret Song)"Over the Rainbow" by Katharine McPhee (Secret Song)"What Is Love?" by Haddaway (Secret Song)Currently, 150 songs are up for download on the X360 and PS3 versions of the game.Â They cost $1.50 apiece and are all from previous Karaoke Revolution games.
